type: Surrey RCMP Firearms Training/Medical Van Fit Up Requirement
short_summary: Surrey RCMP Training & Development Unit requires the up-fit of a Ford Transit 250 AWD High Roof, Sliding Side Door van that will be supplied by the RCMP.
description: The Surrey RCMP Training & Development Unit requires the up-fit of a Ford Transit 250 AWD High Roof, Sliding Side Door van that will be supplied by the RCMP. All the deliverables must be received on or before February 28, 2023. Basis of selection: Lowest Price compliant proposal Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at: 14200 Green Timbers Way, Mailstop 1004, Surrey BC, V3T 6P3 Refer to the attached tender documents to obtain further information. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
tags: Surrey RCMP Firearms Training/Medical Van Fit Up Requirement
